wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Mantle (9 May 1908 – 1977) was an English professional footballer who played as a centre forward. He was a prolific goalscorer for a number of clubs in the Football League, and also had a short spell in the Scottish Football League with Hearts.

response: Born in West Ham, he started his career with Ellesmere Port and later played for Chester. In October 1926, Burley was signed by Football League First Division side Burnley. He made his debut for the club in the goalless draw with Bury on 6 November 1926. Burley made only one more appearance during the 1926–27, deputising for Joe Devine in the 0–2 defeat away at Huddersfield Town on 12 March 1927. He again made just two league appearances in the following campaign. Burley played his last competitive match for Burnley on 8 February 1928 in the 1–3 loss to Aston Villa, a game which saw Archie Heslop and Joe Mantle make their debuts for the club.Simpson (2007), p. 181
